article_title: Details released of Bill Clinton’s AZ visit Sunday
article_text:
Bill Clinton will campaign for his wife Hillary Clinton in Tucson and Phoenix. (Source: KMOV).

New details have been announced surrounding Former Pres. Bill Clinton visit to Arizona Sunday to campaign for his wife.

In Tucson, Pres. Clinton will hold a rally at Sunnyside High School at 1725 E Bilby Road with former Congresswoman Gabby Giffords, Capt. Mark Kelly and former Congressman Ron Barber.

The 2:30 p.m. event will spotlight Hillary Clinton's commitment to tackle gun violence in communities in Arizona and across America. Doors open at 1:30 p.m.

In Phoenix, Pres. Clinton will hold a 5:30 p.m. organizing event at Central High School at 4525 N Central Ave. to mobilize voters ahead of Arizona’s Presidential Preference Election on Tuesday.

Doors at the school open at 4:30 p.m. local time
